title: 90 Minutes in Heaven: See Life's Troubles in a Whole New Light
description: What happens when we die' What's heaven like' Are angels real' These are only a few of the questions Don Piper explores in this video curriculum based on his best-selling book. Seven sessions will help small-group members see the challenges they face in light of the eternal place God has prepared for them. Four DVDs.
author: Don Piper
